text: Dispatch false marching orders to an army, thereby diminishing its range and causing the troops to be fatigued in battle.
Vocally support your faction within the court, thereby improving diplomatic relations.
Set a plot to assassinate the faction leader in motion.
Acquire additional covert relations and assets within the faction, thereby allowing you to bolster your undercover network overall.
Turn direct command of this spy's retinue over to you, forcing any other generals to be recalled and granting you a new active army in the field.
Arrange for an army's provisions to be poisoned, thereby inflicting casualties upon its units.
Prevent supplies from reaching an army, thereby hindering replenishment of units.
Trigger a civil war between those most loyal to the spy and those less satisfied with their rule, strongly reinforcing your influence over the faction in the process.
Set a plot to assassinate the faction heir in motion.
Manipulate the faction's trade efforts, thereby increasing your own trade power.
Incite a malcontent to spread untoward rumours about the faction, thereby slightly diminishing satisfaction throughout the court.
Help maintain your spy's loyalty by keeping their satisfaction within the target faction in check.
Order the spy to defect, thereby turning control of their governed territory over to you.
Arrange for a garrison's provisions to be poisoned, thereby inflicting casualties upon its units.
Meddle in the faction's intelligence efforts, thereby diminishing their counter spying attempts and increasing your spy's cover.
Attempt to manipulate the spy into being sent into the field as a general.\\n\\nNote that this depends on the target faction's need for generals and does not guarantee a military appointment!
Open the settlement's gates, thereby leaving it open to attack.
Prevent supplies from reaching a garrison, thereby hindering replenishment of units.
Steal a random item from the faction before escaping with it back to your own.

Attempt to manipulate the spy into being granted administrative powers over a commandery.\\n\\nNote that this depends on the target faction's need for administrators and does not guarantee an administrative appointment!

Attempt to manipulate the spy into being granted one of the faction offices.\\n\\nNote that this depends on the availability of ministerial positions within the target faction and does not guarantee a military appointment!
Obstruct the faction's trade efforts, thereby diminishing their trade power.
Spread malicious rumours about a character, thereby significantly diminishing their satisfaction within the court.
Arrange for a loyal member of your undercover network to infiltrate a known character's army, thereby granting you its line-of-sight and allowing you to track its manoeuvres.
Leak an army's planned manoeuvres, thereby allowing forces to engage them in night battles regardless of circumstance and increasing their chance of being ambushed.
Order your spy to escape from the faction and return home, thereby ending their undercover operation.
